it was in September of 2016 that Kairos
seijuro the light-rail Avenger met with
his tragic demise Clear Lake California
a man known for carrying a Japanese
sword with them everywhere drowned in
Clear Lake after falling out of his
kayak while on the way to an island to
practice his swordsmanship the body of
Kenneth Anthony Jacinto 30 of Clear Lake
was recovered on Monday according to
lieutenant Steve Brooks of the Lake
County Sheriff's Office Brooks said
Jacinto was reported missing on
September 2nd after falling out of his
kayak and the water off of Clear Lake at
about 6:15 p.m. that day central
dispatch received a call about a boating
accident that occurred offshore of
Austin beach Brooks said Brooks said the
report came in from a 16 year old female
who had been in a boat with Jacinto the
teen told authorities that she and
Jacinto who she identified as her
swordsmanship teacher had launched a
small kayak from Austin beach Brook said
a 30 year old man
